title: In my dream (꿈에)
lyrics: Tone meonghani chaegeul boda nunmuri nasseo ige seulpeu mingabwa.. .. seorap sok sum gyeowat deon ilgijang kkeonae ige apeum mingabwa.. .. woeoeo eo hansiganjeonen jeongmal amureohji anhatjyo woeoeo eo kkumiraseo geuttaen amugeosdo mollasseotjyo woeoeo eo hamkke itgo sipeun maeumilkka ay a mu daedap eomneun neo... kkume neol geurineun feeling geurae sangsang mothaedo nan tto neoreul geuriwoseo dreaming geunyang geurae jam mot deuneun oneulbam  modu jamdeun bam honjaseo u du keoni anja haneul bomyeo meomchun sigan sok na eoril jeok geuttae cheoreom neoui bal gil ttara woeoeo eo eojetbamen naega ireol jureun mollatjyo woeoeo eo kkaeeoboni naegen amu ildo eopseotjyo woeoeoeo dasi bogo sipeun maeumilkka ay a mu uimi eomneun neo... kkume neol geurineun feeling geurae sangsang mothaedo nan tto neoreul geuriwoseo dreaming geunyang geurae jam mot deuneun oneulbam aicheoreom useumyeo neoui pum geu aneseo nae gyeoteseo sumswimyeo neowa hamkke isseulge iksu khamiran naege dogi doeeo daga ojiman nan gyesok kkumeul kkwo... kkume neol geurineun feeling geurae sangsang mothaedo nan tto neoreul geuriwoseo dreaming geunyang geurae jam mot deuneun oneulbam  sangsang mothaedo nan tto neoreul geuriwoseo dreaming geunyang geurae jam mot deuneun geureon oneulbam
